AI Agent Legacy Code Conversion

Transform your outdated codebase into modern, readable Java. Broaden your modernization paths and solve legacy code challenges for the long term.

Our AI deeply understands your legacy code structure and patterns.

How It Works

1
Upload Your Code
Securely upload your legacy codebase to our platform.
2
AI Analysis
Our AI analyzes your code structure, patterns, and dependencies.
3
Conversion Process
The AI converts your code to modern, readable Java.
4
Review & Refine
Review the converted code and request any necessary refinements.
